title: India sets a ₹9.15 lakh crore blueprint for power sector to meet 458 GW demand by 2032
description: India's Ministry of Power has unveiled a ₹9.15 lakh crore National Electricity Plan for 2023-2032 to enhance the power grid and energy security. The plan aims to expand the transmission network and integrate renewable energy sources, targeting a peak demand of 458 GW by 2032. Key initiatives include increasing transmission capacity, electrifying vulnerable households, and improving cybersecurity in the power sector.
